title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Collaborative Instructional Design for Integrating Scientific Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science education and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can filter scientific domain-specific information through at least three levels to search and select credible sources
Learners can critically analyze biases and contexts of scientific data through collaborative activities and produce analytical reports
Learners can cite information collected via smartphone-based tools with over 90% compliance to APA style standards

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
